trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_SEQ_00<tab>Bananas still weigh heavily upon Koana's mind.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wuk Evu.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Koana.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_TODO_02<tab>Wait at the designated location.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKEVU_000_001<tab>I hope I have been of sufficient service to the Third Promise.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKLAMAT_000_005<tab>It's thanks to Wuk Evu that we were able to learn this forest's history.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKLAMAT_000_010<tab>That's twice now that he's helped us. To think that we might never have met him if we hadn't thought to fix the float...
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KOANA_000_015<tab>Wuk Evu has given us valuable insight into the origins of xibruq pibil.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KOANA_000_016<tab>However, we are still no closer to procuring the necessary najool leaves. Unless...
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KOANA_000_017<tab>Tell me─was that historic feast commemorated in some fashion? With a monument, for instance?
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKEVU_000_018<tab>Indeed it was. Allow me to show you.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KOANA_100_018<tab>It is only speculation, but I dare to hope...
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKLAMAT_100_019<tab>What does Koana want with a monument?
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKEVU_100_019<tab>Here it is.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKEVU_000_019<tab>Offered up by the two factions, these weapons symbolize their vow that they would never again raise arms against each other.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KOANA_000_020<tab>Since this feat demands a journey through history, I thought it only logical that a monument like this might steer us true.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KOANA_100_020<tab>Especially one at the heart of so significant a battlefield.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KOANA_000_021<tab>Lamaty'i, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─would you help me search this area for clues? Tell me if anything catches your eye.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKLAMAT_000_022<tab>Sure thing!
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KOANA_100_022<tab>Look here─this soil has been recently overturned.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKLAMAT_000_023<tab>Oooh, someone buried a box!
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KOANA_000_024<tab>Well, well... I would have been satisfied to find only a hint, but here they are─fresh najool leaves.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KOANA_100_024<tab>Hunmu Rruk's doing, I'd wager. There's a poetry in hiding them on this battlefield, given that it was central to the war they helped end.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKLAMAT_000_027<tab>Heh! So he planned all this from the start!
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKLAMAT_000_028<tab>Thank you again, Wuk Evu. We wouldn't have found these leaves without your help.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKEVU_000_029<tab>It was my honor to render assistance.

TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKEVU_000_030<tab>And, with apologies to present company, allow me to offer my encouragement as well, Third Promise. Ever since I witnessed your performance in the Feat of Reeds, I have been certain that <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> are the claimant most worthy of leading our nation.

TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKEVU_000_031<tab>All devised solutions to the Hanuhanu's ailing crops, but you alone sought to know their culture and revive Ihih'hana, even if it seemed unrelated to your task.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKEVU_000_032<tab>In my humble opinion, no one cares more for the people of Tuliyollal and what they hold dear.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKEVU_000_033<tab>Should you again require the historical musings of an old shipwright, I am ever at your service.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKEVU_000_034<tab>For now, I take my leave.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KOANA_000_035<tab>I cannot argue with that...
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KOANA_000_036<tab>...We have what we need. Let us return to Iq Br'aax.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKLAMAT_000_040<tab>You have to wonder whether Wuk Evu is actually a historian and not a shipwright.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KOANA_000_045<tab>I'm glad we were successful. The others should be back soon, I expect.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKLAMAT_000_046<tab>I hope so─I'm famished!
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KOANA_000_050<tab>How did everyone fare?
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKLAMAT_000_051<tab>We got the najool leaves! Wuk Evu came along and helped us find them!
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KRILE_000_052<tab>Wuk Evu was here? I would have liked to say hello.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKLAMAT_000_053<tab>Yes, he gave us an important history lesson...
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_ALPHINAUD_000_054<tab>That Gulool Ja Ja brought an end to centuries of warfare surprises me little─but to achieve said peace through cuisine is something else entirely.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKLAMAT_000_055<tab>Leave it to my old man to find the oddest of solutions. But how about the rest of you? Is our kitchen ready?

TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KRILE_000_056<tab>Everything should be in order. Urianger and I made another tour of the village and borrowed the cooking utensils we need─with no mention of what we needed them <var 1A 02 /var>for<var 1A 01 /var>, of course.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_ALPHINAUD_000_057<tab>And I am pleased to report that we are stocked with the finest firewood this forest had on offer.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_ALISAIE_000_058<tab>Spoken like a true expert.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_ALISAIE_000_059<tab>Erenville and I found our ibruq, so we should have meat aplenty.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_ERENVILLE_000_060<tab>It was a spirited creature. So much so that its hunter fell down a cenote trying to catch it...
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_ALISAIE_000_061<tab>What part of “never speak of this to anyone” did you not understand!?

TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_THANCRED_000_062<tab>I picked a good portion of local herbs, with particular attention to the seeds that yield achiote. I'm told our resident astrologian divined the appropriate measurements for the seasoning as well.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_URIANGER_100_062<tab>Aye. Through further inquiry did I determine the ideal balance of spices.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KOANA_000_063<tab>Then all that remains is to prepare the dish itself. I presume that at least one among us is versed in the culinary arts?
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KRILE_000_064<tab>I can hardly claim profound skill, but I have cooked for myself. You can leave the rest to me.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KRILE_100_064<tab>And you, I hope. As I recall, you are an accomplished culinarian.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KRILE_200_064<tab>And you, I hope. I could use your adventurer's grit when it comes to skinning the ibruq.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKLAMAT_000_065<tab>Oooh, my mouth is watering already!
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KRILE_000_066<tab>Without further delay, then!
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_KRILE_000_070<tab>I'm relieved that our dish was well received.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_ERENVILLE_000_075<tab>One final feat remains. After this one, I hardly know what to expect.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_ALPHINAUD_000_080<tab>Depriving the First Promise of a keystone is a crucial victory indeed.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_ALISAIE_000_085<tab>We need to start considering how to reclaim that keystone from Bakool Ja Ja...
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKLAMAT_000_090<tab>That was sooo good! I'm already looking forward to having xibruq pibil again.
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKLAMAT_000_091<tab>Here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Krile made more using leftover ingredients. You'll love it!
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_WUKLAMAT_000_092<tab>I'm thinking to buy more for the road, myself. Now that the Feat of Repast is over, the villagers should be free to offer it to us, right?
TEXT_KINGMC104_04900_SYSTEM_000_093<tab>New wares are now available from the Xbr'aal merchant in Iq Br'aax.
